column2: #regex code first captures everything before the first comma in the City string and then captures the two-letter state abbreviation at the end of the City string (most regex code has been cobbled together from websites like stackoverflow and datacamp etc.. given I was rather unfamiliar with this type of coding and then I used CGPT to help explain what the code does - I feel this type of learning thats supported by CGPT was a legitimate use of the software as discussed in class))
